text: How is the warning coming through?
How would that link in the form field area. Would we just need to add the Custom option code as above?
Guessing through the little error things at the bottom of the custom module editor
HMM. Seems like they should probably send an email as we get closer to the date when they stop this from happening
We're still thinking about how best to expose this information to you through the design tools
Well I’m a fan of what you guys have been exposing through the little error popups at the bottom, I’ve found that helpful.
Except when it gives you useless output like [ missing {{no-name}} parameter] then gives you a line number in a macro & file that's referenced via @import

Suggestion: Add form as a column type. I would personally be okay with it just returning the form id if it’s too hard to give it all the same options as custom modules get.

I realize it may not be a super common use case but could see it being useful for dynamic pages.

For my specific use case that it’d be handy right now - I’m building an SPA that has to load different HS forms based on the HubDB row. We’re just going to enter the form id’s as text input to work around the missing form field. Not a big deal but not as convenient.
